thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 47 of 2268
thread.title: Sue_Whitehead

author: Sue_Whitehead
title: Sue_Whitehead
text:
We've had a couple of wood Venetian blinds now for our new house. We've been so impressed, the samples arrived very quickly and we got a hand written note to apologise one was missing (even though it came the next day). Customer service is excellent. The blinds came quickly, are well made and overall great quality. Good value for money, would buy more and recommend!
Sue
